main event: A civilian observed an oval-shaped reddish glow making erratic maneuvers in the sky southeast of Alexandria, Virginia on May 22, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed moving very rapidly with an erratic course., The sighting was made with the naked eye and lasted approximately 30 minutes., No radar or other aircraft observed the object during that time., The weather conditions were clear with visibility over 40 miles., The report classified the object as insufficient data for evaluation, leaning towards being a balloon or aircraft.
